data.chText: 修剪；修整
data.enText: to make sth neater, smaller, better, etc., by cutting parts from it

data.chText: 理发
修剪树篱
培训预算削减了1万英镑。
data.enText: The training budget had been trimmed by £10 000.

data.chText: 切去，割掉，剪下，除去（不必要的部分）
data.enText: to cut away unnecessary parts from sth

data.chText: 把多余的肥膘从肉上切掉。
data.enText: Trim any excess fat off the meat.

data.chText: 我把裙子的下摆剪短了两厘米。
data.enText: I trimmed two centimetres off the hem of the skirt.

data.chText: 装饰，修饰，点缀（尤指某物的边缘）
data.enText: to decorate sth, especially around its edges

data.chText: 毛皮镶边的手套
随风扬帆；见风转舵
data.enText: to arrange the sails of a boat to suit the wind so that the boat moves faster

data.chText: 减少开支；削减费用
（使）变小；缩减
data.enText: to become smaller in size; to make sth smaller

data.chText: 通过控制饮食，他的体重从90公斤减到了70公斤。
data.enText: Using the diet he's trimmed down from 90 kilos to 70.

data.chText: （尤指毛发的）修剪
data.enText: an act of cutting a small amount off sth, especially hair

data.chText: 洗头理发
这树篱得修剪了。
（衣服、家具、汽车等的）饰物，边饰，装饰配件
data.enText: material that is used to decorate clothes, furniture, cars, etc., especially along the edges, by being a different colour, etc.

data.chText: 这款汽车的座椅有黑红两种颜色。
data.enText: The car is available with black or red trim (= the colour of the seats) .

data.chText: 镶有白边的蓝色上衣
data.enText: a blue jacket with a white trim

data.chText: 状态良好；健康极佳；井然有序
他每天跑步保持身体健康。
data.enText: He keeps in trim by running every day.

data.chText: 这个球队需要为下个赛季做好准备。
data.enText: The team need to get in trim for the coming season.

data.chText: 苗条的；修长的；健康优雅的
她的身材保持得很苗条。
修长的身材
整齐的；精心照管的；井然有序的
精心管理的花园

means: 切去，割掉，剪下，除去(不必要的部分)
装饰，修饰，点缀(尤指某物的边缘)
(衣服、家具、汽车等的)饰物，边饰，装饰配件

data.chText: 随风扬帆；见风转舵
data.enText: to arrange the sails of a boat to suit the wind so that the boat moves faster

data.chText: 减少开支；削减费用
状态良好；健康极佳；井然有序
他每天跑步保持身体健康。
data.enText: He keeps in trim by running every day.

data.chText: 这个球队需要为下个赛季做好准备。
data.enText: The team need to get in trim for the coming season.

data.chText: （使）变小；缩减
data.enText: to become smaller in size; to make sth smaller

data.chText: 通过控制饮食，他的体重从90公斤减到了70公斤。
data.enText: Using the diet he's trimmed down from 90 kilos to 70.

tr: cutting down to the desired size or shape
a decoration or adornment on a garment
attitude of an aircraft in flight when allowed to take its own orientation
a state of arrangement or appearance
adjust (sails on a ship) so that the wind is optimally used
cut down on
make a reduction in
example: The employer wants to cut back health benefits

tr: cut closely
remove the edges from and cut down to the desired size
cultivate, tend, and cut back the growth of
example: dress the plants in the garden

tr: decorate (food), as with parsley or other ornamental foods
decorate, as with ornaments
be in equilibrium during a flight
balance in flight by regulating the control surfaces
thin and fit
example: the spare figure of a marathon runner
a body kept trim by exercise

tr: severely simple in line or design
neat and smart in appearance
example: a clean-cut and well-bred young man
the trig corporal in his jaunty cap

tr: of places
characterized by order and neatness
free from disorder

value.def: Something that is trim is neat, tidy, and attractive.

example.ex: The neighbours' gardens were trim and neat.
example.tran: 邻居们的花园整洁美观。

value.def: If you describe someone's figure as trim, you mean that it is attractive because there is no extra fat on their body.

example.ex: The driver was a trim young woman of perhaps thirty.
example.tran: 司机是个大约 30 岁的身材苗条的年轻女子。

value.def: If you trim something, for example someone's hair, you cut off small amounts of it in order to make it look neater and tidier.

example.ex: My friend trims my hair every eight weeks...
example.tran: 我朋友每 8 个星期为我修剪一次头发。

example.ex: Grass shears are specially made to trim grass growing in awkward places.
example.tran: 除草剪刀专门用于修剪缝隙角落里的青草。

value.def: If a government or other organization trims something such as a plan, policy, or amount, they reduce it slightly in extent or size.

example.ex: American companies looked at ways they could trim these costs...
example.tran: 美国公司研究了能够削减这些成本的方法。
我们缩小了市场营销部的规模。

value.def: If something such as a piece of clothing is trimmed with a type of material or design, it is decorated with it, usually along its edges.

example.ex: ...jackets, which are then trimmed with crocheted flowers...
example.tran: 另外以钩花镶边的夹克

example.ex: I am wearing a plaid nightgown trimmed with white lace.
example.tran: 我穿着一件带有白色蕾丝花边的格子呢睡衣。
他身穿一件镶毛边的外套。

value.def: The trim on something such as a piece of clothing is a decoration, for example along its edges, that is in a different colour or material.

example.ex: ...a white satin scarf with black trim...
The saddles feature a reflective trim for night time visibility.
example.tran: 这些车座的特点是带有在夜间可视的反光镶边。

value.def: When people are in trim or in good trim, they are in good physical condition.

example.ex: He is already getting in trim for the big day...
example.tran: 他已经在为那个重要的日子调整状态了。

example.ex: It is an excellent way of keeping my voice in trim.
example.tran: 那是保持我声线处于良好状态的极好办法。
